formulas.name: Secant Squared Integral
formulas.description: Integral appearing in many trig substitution problems

formulas.name: Integration by Parts
formulas.description: ILATE rule for choosing u: Inverse trig > Log > Algebraic > Trig > Exponential
formulas.example: ∫x·e^x dx: u=x, dv=e^x dx → xe^x − e^x + C

formulas.name: Partial Fractions
formulas.description: Decompose rational functions for integration. Factor denominator first.

formulas.name: King's Rule (Symmetry Property)
formulas.description: Replace x by a-x for definite integrals. Essential for JEE problems.
formulas.example: ∫₀^(π/2) sinⁿx/(sinⁿx+cosⁿx) dx = π/4 for any n

formulas.name: Even/Odd Function Property
formulas.formula: ∫₋ₐᵃ f(x) dx = 2∫₀ᵃ f(x) dx if f is even; = 0 if f is odd
formulas.description: Simplifies definite integrals of symmetric functions

formulas.name: Periodic Function Property
formulas.formula: ∫₀ⁿᵀ f(x) dx = n∫₀ᵀ f(x) dx if f has period T
formulas.description: For periodic functions over multiple periods

formulas.name: Fundamental Theorem of Calculus
formulas.formula: ∫ₐᵇ f(x) dx = F(b) − F(a) where F'(x) = f(x)

formulas.name: Area Under Curve
formulas.description: Use absolute value if curve goes below x-axis

formulas.name: Area Between Two Curves
formulas.description: Subtract lower curve from upper curve

formulas.name: Leibniz Rule
formulas.description: Differentiation under integral sign with variable limits
